definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Chuang Tsu stresses on the natural principle of 'Tao' and the regulative character of the beauty.
sentences.chinese: 庄子强调了“道”的自然性原则和美的合规律的特点。

sentences.english: Overspray shall conform to the specified adhesion tests.
sentences.chinese: 过量喷漆需符合规定的粘合测试。

sentences.english: Provides a user-controlled layer of security for compliance reporting and auditing.
sentences.chinese: 为合规性报告和审计提供用户控制级的安全性。

sentences.english: There is no practical way to check if the web page you just coded conforms to the spec.
sentences.chinese: 没有可行的方法来检查你刚写好的网页是否符合规范。

sentences.english: Customs duty exemption or reduction will be granted by the customs upon finding conformity with the competent provisions.
sentences.chinese: 经海关审查符合规定的，予以减征或者免征关税。

sentences.english: Results moxonidine tablets complied with the test for uniformity of content.
sentences.chinese: 结果莫索尼定片含量均匀度符合规定。

sentences.english: However, the message will be unreadable to the administrator, which addresseses the compliance requirement.
sentences.chinese: 但是，管理员不能阅读消息，这满足了合规性要求。

sentences.english: Company D's board of directors instructed its two subsidiaries does not compliance with the regulation.
sentences.chinese: 戊公司的董事会对其两家子公司的指示不符合规定。

sentences.english: Rule three encourages the definition of the policy compliance criteria and mechanisms for their verification.
sentences.chinese: 第三条规则是鼓励政策合规准则和校验方法的定义。

sentences.english: How to handle irregularities certificate such as white bars.
sentences.chinese: 会计人员收到白条等不合规定的凭证，如何处理？

sentences.english: Bolt Hole Spacing should be consistent with the allowable deviation of norms.
sentences.chinese: 螺栓孔孔距的允许偏差应符合规范的规定。

sentences.english: Fabrication notes, tolerances, and other critical standards-compliance information.
sentences.chinese: 制作注释，公差和其他关键标准的合规性信息。

sentences.english: They include documentation of current deviations from the spec on their Web site.
sentences.chinese: 网站上提供的文档说明了当前不符合规范的地方。

sentences.english: Check the Toe setting on the vehicle and reset if not within specifications.
sentences.chinese: 检查车辆束角，如不合规格则重新设定。
换言之，为什么不需要评判合规性？

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
